oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The vicious Water-tortoise and the charitable Ratel (Mellivora), a fable related to Dia!kwain, by his mother (L V.-5. 4265-4291). The Ratel used to be a man. 1) See also The Story of the Ratel (or Mellivora) and the Waterskilpad and The story of the Leopard Tortoise, 2) This story is found in Book V-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A further explanation of the ratel (or Mellivora): why it is like a man
